block.l: var json = JSON.parse(rawJson); function objToArray(obj){ if ((typeof obj !== 'object') || obj === null) { return obj; } var struct = []; if (Array.isArray(obj)) { for (var i = 0; i < obj.length; i++) { struct.push(objToArray(obj[i])); } } else { var keys = Object.keys(obj); for (var i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) { struct.push([keys[i], objToArray(obj[keys[i]])]); } } return struct; } function arrayToSnapList(array){ if (!Array.isArray(array)) { return array; } return new List(array.map(arrayToSnapList)); } console.log(objToArray(json)); return arrayToSnapList(objToArray(json));
